golgui.components

Class GuiMessenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • golgui.components.GuiMessenger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserInteraction

    public class GuiMessenger
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserInteraction
    Contains a GUI utility that can be used to handle communication with the user.
    Version:
    1.0
